alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 06 at 2:57AM AKST until November 08 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT AKST MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight AKST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will mix with or change over to freezing rain Monday afternoon.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
